title: Training Is Very Slow If Pretrained Model Is Used
body:
I am using windows 10 with latest version of DFL, My system configuration is

-  32GB Ram
- AMD Ryzen 9 3900 XT
- GPU Nvidia RTX 3070 8GB

I am using SAEHD training with pretrained models and i noticed the training speed is very slow.
SNAPSHOT

```
================== Model Summary ===================
==                                                ==
==            Model name: pre192 _SAEHD           ==
==                                                ==
==     Current iteration: 133                     ==
==                                                ==
==---------------- Model Options -----------------==
==                                                ==
==            resolution: 192                     ==
==             face_type: wf                      ==
==     models_opt_on_gpu: True                    ==
==                 archi: liae-ud                 ==
==               ae_dims: 224                     ==
==                e_dims: 64                      ==
==                d_dims: 64                      ==
==           d_mask_dims: 22                      ==
==       masked_training: True                    ==
==       eyes_mouth_prio: True                    ==
==           uniform_yaw: True                    ==
==             adabelief: True                    ==
==            lr_dropout: cpu                     ==
==           random_warp: False                   ==
==       true_face_power: 0.0                     ==
==      face_style_power: 0.0                     ==
==        bg_style_power: 0.0                     ==
==               ct_mode: none                    ==
==              clipgrad: True                    ==
==              pretrain: False                   ==
==       autobackup_hour: 0                       ==
== write_preview_history: False                   ==
==           target_iter: 0                       ==
==       random_src_flip: True                    ==
==       random_dst_flip: False                   ==
==            batch_size: 12                      ==
==             gan_power: 0.0                     ==
==        gan_patch_size: 40                      ==
==              gan_dims: 16                      ==
==                                                ==
==------------------ Running On ------------------==
==                                                ==
==          Device index: 0                       ==
==                  Name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 ==
==                  VRAM: 8.00GB                  ==
==                                                ==
====================================================
Starting. Press "Enter" to stop training and save model.
[10:34:10][#000323][0412ms][2.3860][2.2923]
[10:48:56][#000508][0373ms][2.0657][1.9254]
[10:57:32][#000617][0361ms][1.7737][1.7260]
```

I don't know if it supposed to work like that or is it a bug?
